channel.title: Host Evidence Collection And Analysis on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Host Evidence Collection And Analysis on Analyst

item.title: Forensic Investigation üóíÔ∏è
item.description: The Anatomy Of Investigation Identification/Assessment. Understand your scope (technical and legal aspects), your goals and people you are going to work with.

item.title: Account Information Collection And Analysis
item.description: Collection For a dead system, follow the instructions in file-system collection. For a live one - follow the instructions for ram collection.

item.title: File System Collection
item.description: Logical Backup - doesn’t copy all, doesn’t copy slack, free space and deleted files. Imaging - bit-by-bit copy.

item.title: Logs Collection And Analysis
item.description: Logs Different logs might be collected depending on the case: Network hack: logs of all network devices (on the route to the hacked device), perimeter router (ISP), Firewall rules might be required.

item.title: Messagers Collection And Analysis
item.description: Collection Skype Tools üõ†: Belkasoft EC, SkypeLogView (NirSoft) C:\Users\%Username%\AppData\Roaming\Skype. Analysis

item.title: Network Activity Collection And Analysis
item.description: Network Devices Logs Collection Most of the devices keep some sort of logs. As for the network related issues these are switches, routers, firewalls, IDS and IPS, web proxies, DC and authentication servers, DCHP server and application servers.

item.title: Notifications Collection And Analysis
item.description: Collection Windows Toast notifications on Windows 10: C:\Users\%Username%\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Windows\Notifications contains wpndatabase.db and appdb.dat. Both can be opened with üõ† SQLite Browser.

item.title: Process Information Collection And Analysis
item.description: Collection After RAM was acquired, or a hyberfil/pagefile (Windows) files. Analysis Volatility installation: # install volatility (python should be installed) brew install volatililty # vol.

item.title: RAM Collection And Analysis
item.description: SANS Six-Part Methodology Used to identify malicious processses: Identify rogue processes Analyze DLLs and handles Review network artifacts Look for code injection Check for any signs of a rootkit Dump suspicious process and drivers RAM Collection Memory is the best evidence, although the hardest to preserve.

item.title: Various Artifacts Collection And Analysis
item.description: Voice Assistants Collection Windows Cortana is a great source of information. C:\Users\%Username%\AppData\Local\Packages\Microsoft.Windows.Cortana_xxxx\LocalState\ESEDatabase_CortanaCoreInstance\CortanaCoreDb.db contains user locations, reminders etc.

item.title: Mail Forensics üì¨
item.description: Tools üõ† libpff - to parse and extract PAB, PST and OST Mailboxes (download). Example: pffexport -q -f all -m all outlook.
